title: The Midnight Library
author: Matt Haig
description: A dazzling novel about all the choices that go into a life well lived.

title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: An easy and proven way to build good habits and break bad ones.

title: Project Hail Mary
author: Andy Weir
description: A lone astronaut must save the earth from disaster in this incredible new science-based thriller.

title: Where the Crawdads Sing
author: Delia Owens
description: A heartbreaking story of survival and a stunning coming-of-age novel.

title: The Psychology of Money
author: Morgan Housel
description: Timeless lessons on wealth, greed, and happiness.

title: Educated
author: Tara Westover
description: A memoir about a young girl who leaves her survivalist family and goes on to earn a PhD.

title: The Silent Patient
author: Alex Michaelides
description: A shocking psychological thriller of a woman's act of violence against her husband.

title: Sapiens
author: Yuval Noah Harari
description: A brief history of humankind from the Stone Age to the modern age.

title: The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo
author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
description: A captivating story about a Hollywood icon who recounts her scandalous life.

title: Thinking, Fast and Slow
author: Daniel Kahneman
description: A groundbreaking tour of the mind and explains the two systems that drive the way we think.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian social science fiction novel and cautionary tale.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
description: A philosophical book about following your dreams and finding your destiny.

title: Becoming
author: Michelle Obama
description: The intimate memoir of the former First Lady of the United States.

title: The Hobbit
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: A timeless classic about the journey of Bilbo Baggins to win a share of treasure.

title: The Four Agreements
author: Don Miguel Ruiz
description: A practical guide to personal freedom based on ancient Toltec wisdom.

title: Gone Girl
author: Gillian Flynn
description: A psychological thriller about a marriage gone terribly wrong.

title: The Power of Now
author: Eckhart Tolle
description: A guide to spiritual enlightenment and living in the present moment.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
description: The magical first book in the beloved Harry Potter series.

title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
author: Mark Manson
description: A counterintuitive approach to living a good life.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A gripping tale of racial injustice and childhood innocence in the Deep South.
